claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: René Descartes  (  -LSB- ˈdeɪˌkɑrt -RSB- -LSB- ʁəne dekaʁt -RSB- ; Latinized : Renatus Cartesius ; adjectival form : `` Cartesian '' ; 31 March 159611 February 1650  )  was a French philosopher , mathematician , and scientist .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dubbed the father of modern western philosophy , much of subsequent Western philosophy is a response to his writings , which are studied closely to this day .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A native of the Kingdom of France , he spent about 20 years of his life in the Dutch Republic .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Descartes 's Meditations on First Philosophy continues to be a standard text at most university philosophy departments .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Descartes 's influence in mathematics is equally apparent ; the Cartesian coordinate system -- allowing reference to a point in space as a set of numbers , and allowing algebraic equations to be expressed as geometric shapes in a two - or three-dimensional coordinate system  (  and conversely , shapes to be described as equations  )  -- was named after him .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is credited as the father of analytical geometry , the bridge between algebra and geometry , used in the discovery of infinitesimal calculus and analysis .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Descartes was also one of the key figures in the scientific revolution .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He frequently set his views apart from those of his predecessors .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In the opening section of the Passions of the Soul , a treatise on the early modern version of what are now commonly called emotions , Descartes goes so far as to assert that he will write on this topic `` as if no one had written on these matters before '' .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His best known philosophical statement is `` Cogito ergo sum ''  (  Je pense , donc je suis I think , therefore I am  )  , found in part IV of Discourse on the Method  (  1637 ; written in French but with inclusion of `` Cogito ergo sum ''  )  and § 7 of part I of Principles of Philosophy  (  1644 ; written in Latin  )  .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Many elements of his philosophy have precedents in late Aristotelianism , the revived Stoicism of the 16th century , or in earlier philosophers like Augustine .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In his natural philosophy , he differed from the schools on two major points : first , he rejected the splitting of corporeal substance into matter and form ; second , he rejected any appeal to final ends -- divine or natural -- in explaining natural phenomena .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In his theology , he insists on the absolute freedom of God 's act of creation .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Descartes laid the foundation for 17th-century continental rationalism , later advocated by Baruch Spinoza and Gottfried Leibniz , and opposed by the empiricist school of thought consisting of Hobbes , Locke , Berkeley , and Hume .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Leibniz , Spinoza and Descartes were all well-versed in mathematics as well as philosophy , and Descartes and Leibniz contributed greatly to science as well .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Anselm defined God as `` that than which nothing greater can be thought '' , and argued that this being must exist in the mind , even in the mind of the person who denies the existence of God .

claim: René Descartes has argued for the Existence of God.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He argued that `` existing '' adds nothing  (  including perfection  )  to the essence of a being , and thus a `` supremely perfect '' being can be conceived not to exist .
